entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -42.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 06:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -42.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -46.2°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
